faqs.answer: We offer flexible lease options including annual contracts with renewal options, multi-year agreements for established businesses, and short-term rentals (minimum 6 months) for pop-up stores or seasonal businesses. Security deposits typically equal 1-2 months' rent.

faqs.answer: Tenants can usually make non-structural modifications with owner approval. Major renovations require written consent and often need to be restored at lease end. We facilitate these discussions to ensure spaces meet your business needs while protecting property value.

faqs.answer: Our shop rentals feature robust security including night patrols, CCTV surveillance in common areas, and secure locking systems. Additional security measures can often be implemented based on tenant requirements and property specifications.
